Name: Dark Hood
About the game: Dark Hood is a hardcore game created by indie developers in a nostalgic pixel style. 2D Platformer. Combination of cyberpunk and magic. In this game, you will experience: 5 distinctive bosses 20 different items and skills 1 main quest and 5 side stories and more!
